name: Runner Buds
description:
Runner Buds is a platform runner game where you play as an animal and collect points. 

But this is a game that will not only be an endless runner where you collect points by running and sliding, but also will have unique characters and a story that develops within itself.

Yeah, this game is named Runner Buds. But WHERE IS THE OTHER ONES? They're on their way. They're coming don't worry :3 

We literally speedrunned this demo so this page will continue to update.

Controls:

Space - Jump
x2 Space - Double Jump
S key - Slide

Team Berceste:

Özgün Özer - Coder
Emirhan Atlayan - Coder
Gizem Karagöz - Pixel Artist
Sude Babur - Pixel Artist, Game Designer
